text: The Congress of the Communist Party of Cuba (Congreso del Partido Comunista de Cuba) is the highest decision-making body of the Cuban party-state. ==Convocations== {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Congress ! scope="col" | Duration (start—end) ! scope="col" | Delegates ! scope="col" | CC elected ! scope="col" | Central Report (presented by) ! scope="col" | Charter (amendments) ! scope="col" | PMR |- | align="left" scope="row" style="font- weight:normal;" | 1st Congress 6 days 1975 election | 17 December – 22 December 1975 | 3,116 | ? FM – 14 AM | Fidel Castro | Adopted | — |- | align="left" scope="row" style="font- weight:normal;" | 2nd Congress 4 days 1979–1980 election |17 December – 20 December 1980 | 1,780 | 148 FM – ? CM | Fidel Castro | Amendment | — |- | align="left" scope="row" style="font- weight:normal;" | 3rd Congress 4 days 1985–1986 election | 4 February – 7 February 1986 | 1,784 | 146 FM – 79 AM | Fidel Castro | Amendment | — |- | align="left" scope="row" style="font-weight:normal;" | 4th Congress 5 days 1990–1991 election | 10 October – 14 October 1991 | 1,772 | 225 | Fidel Castro | Amendment | — |- | align="left" scope="row" style="font-weight:normal;" | 5th Congress 4 days 1996–1997 election | 8 October – 10 October 1997 | 1,500 | 150 | Fidel Castro | Amendment | — |- | align="left" scope="row" style="font-weight:normal;" | 6th Congress 4 days 2010–2011 election | 16 April – 19 April 2011 | 997 | 115 | Raúl Castro | Amendment | 800,000 |- | align="left" scope="row" style="font-weight:normal;" | 7th Congress 4 days 2015–2016 election | 16 April – 19 April 2016 | 995 | 142 | Raúl Castro | — | 670,000 |} The Eighth Congress is scheduled to take place 16 to 19 April 2021.http://en.granma.cu/cuba/2019-12-20/led-by-raul-the-11th-plenum-of-the- communist-party-central-committee-held ==References== ===General=== Information on congresses, number of delegates, number of people elected to CCs, party membership, the individual who presented the Political Report and information on when the congress was convened can be found in these sources: * * * * * * * ===Bibliography=== Articles and journals: ===Specific=== Category:Politics of Cuba Category:Communist Party of Cuba Category:Congresses of communist parties
title: Congress of the Communist Party of Cuba
